00021 /**
00022  * @file   Profile.cpp
00023  * @author Mybrid Spalding
00024  * @date   Mon Mar 24 20:18:26 PDT 2008
00025  * @brief  Basic profile class. Need better means use a 3rd party pkg.
00026  */
00027 
00028 #include "translation/Profile.h"
00029 //
00030 #include "util/Err.h" // includes Verbose.h
00031 //
00032 #include <sstream>
00033 #include <stdio.h>
00034 
00035 using namespace std;
00036 
00037 /*****************************************************************************/
00038 /**
00039  * Profile::begin
00040  * Synopsis: Mark the begin time to be profiled. Resets endTime to startTime.
00041  *
00042  * @return - void
00043  */
00044 /*****************************************************************************/
00045 void Profile::begin()
00046 {
00047 
00048 #if defined (WIN32)
00049 #else
00050   m_endCount = m_startCount;
00051   m_startCount++;
00052 
00053   gettimeofday(&(m_startTimeval), NULL);
00054   m_endTimeval = m_startTimeval;
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 }
00058 // end Profile::begin
00059 /*****************************************************************************/
00060 /*****************************************************************************/
00061 /**
00062  * Profile::end
00063  * Synopsis: Mark the end time of something profiled.
00064  *
00065  * @return - void, throws exception if startTime is not set.
00066  */
00067 /*****************************************************************************/
00068 void Profile::end()
00069 {
00070 #if defined (WIN32)
00071 #else
00072 
00073 
00074   m_endCount++;
00075 
00076   checkTimes();
00077 
00078   gettimeofday(&m_endTimeval, NULL);
00079 
00080   m_totalElapsedSeconds +=
00081     ((m_endTimeval.tv_sec - m_startTimeval.tv_sec) +
00082      ((m_endTimeval.tv_usec - m_startTimeval.tv_usec) / 1000000.0)
00083     );
00084 
00085   m_totalCalls++;
00086 #endif
00087   return;
00088 
00089 }
00090 // end Profile::end
00091 /*****************************************************************************/
00092 /*****************************************************************************/
00093 /**
00094  * Profile::checkTimes
00095  * Synopsis: Checks if endTime - startTime > 0
00096  *
00097  * @return - void, throws exception if endTime - startTime <= 0
00098  */
00099 /*****************************************************************************/
00100 void Profile::checkTimes()
00101 {
00102 
00103 #if defined (WIN32)
00104 #else
00105   if ((m_startCount == 0)  || (m_endCount < m_startCount)) {
00106     if (m_endCount < m_startCount) {
00107       APT_ERR_ABORT("Profile::checkTimes: end() was not called after last begin().\n");
00108     } else {
00109       APT_ERR_ABORT("Profile::checkTimes: begin() was not called.\n");
00110     }
00111   }
00112 #endif
00113 
00114 }
00115 // end Profile::checkTimes()
00116 /*****************************************************************************/
00117 /*****************************************************************************/
00118 /**
00119  * Profile::getElapsedSeconds
00120  * Synopsis: returns endTime - startTime
00121  *
00122  * @return - void, throws exception if startTime and endTime are not set.
00123  */
00124 /*****************************************************************************/
00125 float Profile::getElapsedSeconds()
00126 {
00127 
00128   return m_totalElapsedSeconds;
00129 
00130 }
00131 // end Profile::getElapsedSeconds
00132 /*****************************************************************************/
00133 /*****************************************************************************/
00134 /**
00135  * Profile::getElapsedFormatedString
00136  * Synopsis: returns a formated time std::string as MMmSSs.
00137  *
00138  * Assumes time will never be more than 60 minutes, or 1 hour.
00139  *
00140  * @return - void, throws exception if startTime and endTime are not set.
00141  */
00142 /*****************************************************************************/
00143 std::string Profile::getElapsedFormatedString()
00144 {
00145 
00146   std::string elapsed;
00147 
00148 #if defined (WIN32)
00149 #else
00150 
00151   std::stringstream formatedSStr;
00152   float elapsedSeconds = getElapsedSeconds();
00153 
00154   int elapsedMinutes = int(elapsedSeconds / 60.0);
00155   if (elapsedMinutes > 0) {
00156     elapsedSeconds = elapsedSeconds - (elapsedMinutes * 60.0);
00157   }
00158 
00159   char elapsed_cstr[30];
00160   sprintf(elapsed_cstr, "%02dm%06.3fs", elapsedMinutes, elapsedSeconds);
00161 
00162   elapsed = elapsed_cstr;
00163 
00164 #endif
00165   return elapsed;
00166 
00167 }
00168 // end Profile::getElapsedFormatedString
